children.value: Project(s) on-boarded on inspektre are enhanced to create meaningful knowledge-graphs and help providing contextually relevant information. Below graph shows a quick high-level view on how inspektre graphs look like.

graph TD
    A[Project] -->|CI/CD Pipeline| B(Inspektre API)
    B --> C{Configurations}
    C -->|One| D[Code Intel]
    D --> E(Scans)
    C -->|SAST| F[SARIF ]
    C -->|Detect Attacks possible| G[Attack Patterns]
    G --> H()
    G --> I(A)
export const _frontmatter = {"title":"Structure","metaTitle":"Inspektre | Project Structure","metaDescription":"Inspektre Project Structure"}
